content:
Here's the result of running `cat -n` on /workspace/aws-cloudformation__cfn-lint__4c1ccd414732e78587b491543f168571783d7b8e/src/cfnlint/rules/resources/cloudfront/Aliases.py:
     1	"""
     2	Copyright Amazon.com, Inc. or its affiliates. All Rights Reserved.
     3	SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT-0
     4	"""
     5	
     6	from __future__ import annotations
     7	
     8	from typing import Any
     9	
    10	import regex as re
    11	
    12	from cfnlint.helpers import REGEX_DYN_REF
    13	from cfnlint.jsonschema import ValidationResult, Validator
    14	from cfnlint.rules.jsonschema.CfnLintKeyword import CfnLintKeyword
    15	
    16	
    17	class Aliases(CfnLintKeyword):
    18	    """Check if CloudFront Aliases are valid domain names"""
    19	
    20	    id = "E3013"
    21	    shortdesc = "CloudFront Aliases"
    22	    description = "CloudFront aliases should contain valid domain names"
    23	    source_url = "https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSCloudFormation/latest/UserGuide/aws-properties-cloudfront-distribution-distributionconfig.html#cfn-cloudfront-distribution-distributionconfig-aliases"
    24	    tags = ["properties", "cloudfront"]
    25	
    26	    def __init__(self):
    27	        """Init"""
    28	        super().__init__(
    29	            keywords=[
    30	                "Resources/AWS::CloudFront::Distribution/Properties/DistributionConfig/Aliases/*"
    31	            ]
    32	        )
    33	
    34	    def validate(
    35	        self, validator: Validator, _, instance: Any, schema: dict[str, Any]
    36	    ) -> ValidationResult:
    37	
    38	        if isinstance(instance, str):
    39	            if re.match(REGEX_DYN_REF, instance):
    40	                return
    41	            for err in validator.descend(
    42	                instance=instance,
    43	                schema={
    44	                    "pattern": "^(?!.*(?:\\.\\*\\.)).*",
    45	                },
    46	            ):
    47	                err.rule = self
    48	                yield err
    49	
    50	            for err in validator.descend(
    51	                instance=instance,
    52	                schema={
    53	                    # ruff: noqa: E501
    54	                    "pattern": "^(?:[a-z0-9\\*](?:[a-z0-9-]{0,61}[a-z0-9])?\\.)+[a-z0-9][a-z0-9-]{0,61}[a-z0-9]$",
    55	                },
    56	            ):
    57	                err.rule = self
    58	                yield err
    59
